description: Ms. codex. Title from leaf 2b. Physical description: 19 lines per page; written in neat naskh in black on glazed, laid European paper. Rubrication and catchwords. Occasional staining. Front cover and first two leaves detached. Origin: 10 Dhū al-Ḥijjah 1253 H [7 March 1838], by Ibn Ḥājjī ʻAlī Akbar Muḥammad Mahdī al-Hamadānī (leaf 274b). Incipit: نحمدك يا من وقفنا لسلوك طريق العمل ... وبعد فيقول ... محمد المشتهر بالجواد الکاظمي ... لا يخفي على احد شرف علم الاصول
author: Jawād al-Baghdādī, Jawād ibn Saʻd, -1654 or 1655
abstract: Commentary on Bahāʼ al-Dīn al-ʻĀmilī's Zubdat al-uṣūl, a treatise on uṣūl al-fiqh.
extent: 275 leaves : paper ; 203 x 147 (143 x 89) mm bound to 208 x 149 mm
title: Hādhā Kitāb Sharḥ Jawād.
uniform title: غاية المأمول في شرح زبدة الاصول
provenance: Owner's note on leaf 1a; several stamps on leaves 2b-3a, 274b.
creator: جواد البغدادي، جواد بن سعد، -1654 or 1655
subject: ʻĀmilī, Bahāʼ al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Ḥusayn, 1547-1621—Zubdat al-uṣūl.
binding note: Full brown leather with gold-stamped central mandorla and pendants; yellow paper doublures.
member of collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
